news: In the fall of 2022, the Asian and Paralympic Games will be held in Hangzhou, China. The champion athletes from Uzbekistan will receive $5,000 and 81 million soums, while the silver and bronze medalists will receive $3,000 and 54 million soums, and $2,000 and 27 million soums, respectively. The amount of monetary rewards to be given to coaches, doctors, masseurs, dieticians and others has also been approved.
